name: HighFlyer
description:
Welcome to.. HighFlyer!

In this game you fly your spaceship through the depths of space. Your mission? SURVIVE! First things first you must escape this alienship that has you captive. How? By navigating through challenging levels, shooting down enemies, collecting stars, finding hidden paths of course! Oh and don't forget -- the

-Fly through 30+ levels!

-Fight waves of torrents!

-Collect as many stars as you can!

You can even join the community of HighFlyer players just like you:

http://gamegrapestudios.com/highflyer


So what are you waiting for? Get ready, Get set, and

Get HighFlyer today!
